Name: Zombie Pinball
About the game: Fan of ZOMBIES ? PINBALL games ? You will love ZOMBIE PINBALL ! A super addictive gameplay, A crazy atmosphere, Breathtaking SFXs and musics, 7 different tables, 20 spectacular game modes, Hundreds of challenges ! Frankenstein and his buddies, zombies, werewolves, undead rockers, burning or dripping skeletons will make you sweat... In Zombie Pinball, you will have great fun by smashing zombies ! The game is marked as 'english' only, but the rules of each tables are available in French, English, German, Italian and Spanish.
